verses.verse: וְעַתָּ֥ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now שְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> she-Ma' Yet now hear יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko O Jacob עַבְדִּ֑י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Di; my servant וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> ve-Yis-ra-'El and Israel בָּחַ֥רְתִּי <S%H977><s%> ba-Char-ti whom I have chosen בֽוֹ׃ vo.

כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD עֹשֶׂ֛ךָ <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Se-cha that made וְיֹצֶרְךָ֥ <S%H3335><s%> ve-yo-tzer-Cha thee and formed מִבֶּ֖טֶן <S%H990><s%> mib-Be-ten thee from the womb יַעְזְרֶ֑ךָּ <S%H5826><s%> ya'-ze-Re-ka; [which] will help אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּירָא֙ <S%H3372><s%> ti-Ra thee Fear עַבְדִּ֣י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Di my servant יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, not O Jacob וִישֻׁר֖וּן <S%H3484><s%> vi-shu-Run and thou Jesurun בָּחַ֥רְתִּי <S%H977><s%> ba-Char-ti whom I have chosen בֽוֹ׃ vo.

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֶצָּק־ <S%H3332><s%> 'etz-tzok- For I will pour מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> ma-yim water עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on צָמֵ֔א <S%H6771><s%> tza-Me, upon him that is thirsty וְנֹזְלִ֖ים <S%H5140><s%> ve-no-ze-Lim and floods עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on יַבָּשָׁ֑ה <S%H3004><s%> yab-ba-Shah; upon the dry ground אֶצֹּ֤ק <S%H3332><s%> 'etz-Tzok I will pour רוּחִי֙ <S%H7307><s%> ru-Chi my spirit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon זַרְעֶ֔ךָ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'E-cha, upon thy seed וּבִרְכָתִ֖י <S%H1293><s%> u-vir-cha-Ti and my blessing עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on צֶאֱצָאֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6631><s%> tze-'e-tza-'Ei-cha. upon thine offspring

וְצָמְח֖וּ <S%H6779><s%> ve-tza-me-Chu And they shall spring up בְּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> be-Vein [as] among חָצִ֑יר <S%H2682><s%> cha-Tzir; the grass כַּעֲרָבִ֖ים <S%H6155><s%> ka-'a-ra-Vim as willows עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- by יִבְלֵי־ <S%H2988><s%> yiv-lei- courses מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim. by the water

זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh This יֹאמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> yo-Mar One shall say לַֽיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh I [am] the LORD'S אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni, I וְזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> ve-Zeh one יִקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> yik-Ra and another shall call בְשֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> ve-shem- [himself] by the name יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko; of Jacob וְזֶ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> ve-Zeh, and another יִכְתֹּ֤ב <S%H3789><s%> yich-To and another shall subscribe יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do [with] his hand לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, unto the LORD וּבְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> u-ve-Shem [himself] by the name יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel יְכַנֶּֽה׃ <S%H3655><s%> ye-chan-Neh. and surname פ Peh

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- the King יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וְגֹאֲל֖וֹ <S%H1350><s%> ve-go-'a-Lo and his redeemer יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot; of hosts אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am רִאשׁוֹן֙ <S%H7223><s%> ri-shOn I [am] the first וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni and I אַחֲר֔וֹן <S%H314><s%> a-cha-Ron, and I [am] the last וּמִבַּלְעָדַ֖י <S%H1107><s%> u-mib-bal-'a-Dai and beside אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein and there אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. me [there is] no God

וּמִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> u-mi- Who כָמ֣וֹנִי <S%H3644><s%> cha-Mo-ni is like יִקְרָ֗א <S%H7121><s%> yik-Ra, And who as I shall call וְיַגִּידֶ֤הָ <S%H5046><s%> ve-yag-gi-De-ha and shall declare וְיַעְרְכֶ֙הָ֙ <S%H6186><s%> ve-ya'-re-Che-ha it and set it in order לִ֔י Li, מִשּׂוּמִ֖י <S%H7760><s%> mis-su-Mi for me since I appointed עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> 'am- nation עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam; the ancient וְאֹתִיּ֛וֹת <S%H857><s%> ve-'o-ti-Yot the things וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher and תָּבֹ֖אנָה <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo-nah and shall come יַגִּ֥ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> yag-Gi-du let them shew לָֽמוֹ׃ la-mo.

אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּפְחֲדוּ֙ <S%H6342><s%> tif-cha-Du Fear וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- nay תִּרְה֔וּ <S%H7297><s%> tir-Hu, be afraid הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not מֵאָ֛ז <S%H227><s%> me-'Az thee from that time הִשְׁמַעְתִּ֥יךָ <S%H8085><s%> hish-ma'-Ti-cha have not I told וְהִגַּ֖דְתִּי <S%H5046><s%> ve-hig-Gad-ti and have declared וְאַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem and you עֵדָ֑י <S%H5707><s%> 'e-Dai; [it];ye [are] even my witnesses הֲיֵ֤שׁ <S%H3426><s%> ha-Yesh Is there אֱל֙וֹהַּ֙ <S%H433><s%> e-Lo-ah a God מִבַּלְעָדַ֔י <S%H1107><s%> mib-bal-'a-Dai, beside וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein is there צ֖וּר <S%H6697><s%> tzur me;yea [there is] no God בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- lest יָדָֽעְתִּי׃ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da-'e-ti. I know

יֹֽצְרֵי־ <S%H3335><s%> yo-tze-rei- They that make פֶ֤סֶל <S%H6459><s%> Fe-sel a graven image כֻּלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam are all תֹּ֔הוּ <S%H8414><s%> To-hu, [are] all of them vanity וַחֲמוּדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2530><s%> va-cha-mu-dei-Hem and their delectable things בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- no יוֹעִ֑ילוּ <S%H3276><s%> yo-'I-lu; shall not profit וְעֵדֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5707><s%> ve-'e-dei-Hem and they [are] their own witnesses הֵׅ֗מָּׅהׅ <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah, like בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- fail יִרְא֛וּ <S%H7200><s%> yir-'U they see וּבַל־ <S%H1077><s%> u-val- fail יֵדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> ye-de-'U not nor know לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an so יֵבֹֽשׁוּ׃ <S%H954><s%> ye-Vo-shu. that they may be ashamed

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Who יָצַ֥ר <S%H3335><s%> ya-Tzar Who hath formed אֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> 'el a god וּפֶ֣סֶל <S%H6459><s%> u-Fe-sel a graven image נָסָ֑ךְ <S%H5258><s%> na-Sach; or molten לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti to no הוֹעִֽיל׃ <S%H3276><s%> ho-'Il. [that] is profitable

הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> hen Behold כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all חֲבֵרָיו֙ <S%H2270><s%> cha-ve-Rav Behold all his fellows יֵבֹ֔שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ye-Vo-shu, shall be ashamed וְחָרָשִׁ֥ים <S%H2796><s%> ve-cha-ra-Shim and the workmen הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah themselves מֵֽאָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> me-'a-Dam; they [are] of men יִֽתְקַבְּצ֤וּ <S%H6908><s%> yit-kab-be-Tzu let them all be gathered together כֻלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> chul-Lam all יַֽעֲמֹ֔דוּ <S%H5975><s%> ya-'a-Mo-du, let them stand up יִפְחֲד֖וּ <S%H6342><s%> yif-cha-Du [yet] they shall fear יֵבֹ֥שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ye-Vo-shu [and] they shall be ashamed יָֽחַד׃ <S%H3162><s%> Ya-chad. together

חָרַ֤שׁ <S%H2796><s%> cha-Rash shapes בַּרְזֶל֙ <S%H1270><s%> bar-Zel iron מַֽעֲצָ֔ד <S%H4621><s%> ma-'a-Tzad, with the tongs וּפָעַל֙ <S%H6466><s%> u-fa-'Al both worketh בַּפֶּחָ֔ם <S%H6352><s%> bap-pe-Cham, in the coals וּבַמַּקָּב֖וֹת <S%H4717><s%> u-vam-mak-ka-Vot it with hammers יִצְּרֵ֑הוּ <S%H3335><s%> yitz-tze-Re-hu; and fashioneth וַיִּפְעָלֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6466><s%> vai-yif-'a-Le-hu and worketh בִּזְר֣וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> biz-Ro-a' of his arms כֹּח֔וֹ <S%H3581><s%> ko-Cho, it with the strength גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- also רָעֵב֙ <S%H7456><s%> ra-'Ev gets וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein faileth כֹּ֔חַ <S%H3581><s%> Ko-ach, and his strength לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no שָׁ֥תָה <S%H8354><s%> Sha-tah he drinketh מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim no water וַיִּיעָֽף׃ <S%H3286><s%> vai-yi-'Af. and is faint

חָרַ֣שׁ <S%H2790><s%> cha-Rash altogether עֵצִים֮ <S%H6086><s%> 'e-Tzim wood נָ֣טָה <S%H5186><s%> Na-tah stretcheth out קָו֒ <S%H6957><s%> kav [his] rule יְתָאֲרֵ֣הוּ <S%H8388><s%> ye-ta-'a-Re-hu he marketh it out בַשֶּׂ֔רֶד <S%H8279><s%> vas-Se-red, with a line יַעֲשֵׂ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Se-hu he fitteth בַּמַּקְצֻע֔וֹת <S%H4741><s%> bam-mak-tzu-'ot, it with planes וּבַמְּחוּגָ֖ה <S%H4230><s%> u-vam-me-chu-Gah with the compass יְתָאֳרֵ֑הוּ <S%H8388><s%> ye-to-'o-Re-hu; and he marketh it out וַֽיַּעֲשֵׂ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Se-hu and maketh כְּתַבְנִ֣ית <S%H8403><s%> ke-tav-Nit it after the figure אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, of a man כְּתִפְאֶ֥רֶת <S%H8597><s%> ke-tif-'E-ret according to the beauty אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of a man לָשֶׁ֥בֶת <S%H3427><s%> la-She-vet that it may remain בָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> Ba-yit. in the house

לִכְרָת־ <S%H3772><s%> lich-rot- He heweth him down ל֣וֹ lo אֲרָזִ֔ים <S%H730><s%> 'a-ra-Zim, cedars וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach and taketh תִּרְזָה֙ <S%H8645><s%> tir-Zah the cypress וְאַלּ֔וֹן <S%H437><s%> ve-'al-Lon, and the oak וַיְאַמֶּץ־ <S%H553><s%> vay-'am-metz- which he strengtheneth ל֖וֹ lo בַּעֲצֵי־ <S%H6086><s%> ba-'a-tzei- for himself among the trees יָ֑עַר <S%H3293><s%> Ya-'ar; of the forest נָטַ֥ע <S%H5193><s%> na-Ta' he planteth אֹ֖רֶן <S%H766><s%> 'O-ren an ash וְגֶ֥שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> ve-Ge-shem and the rain יְגַדֵּֽל׃ <S%H1431><s%> ye-gad-Del. doth nourish

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah becomes לְאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> le-'a-Dam Then shall it be for a man לְבָעֵ֔ר <S%H1197><s%> le-va-'Er, to burn וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach for he will take מֵהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem of them וַיָּ֔חָם <S%H2552><s%> vai-Ya-chom, thereof and warm אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- also יַשִּׂ֖יק <S%H5400><s%> yas-Sik himself yea he kindleth וְאָ֣פָה <S%H644><s%> ve-'A-fah [it] and baketh לָ֑חֶם <S%H3899><s%> La-chem; bread אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- also יִפְעַל־ <S%H6466><s%> yif-'al- yea he maketh אֵל֙ <S%H410><s%> 'el a god וַיִּשְׁתָּ֔חוּ <S%H7812><s%> vai-yish-Ta-chu, and worshippeth עָשָׂ֥הוּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sa-hu [it] he maketh פֶ֖סֶל <S%H6459><s%> Fe-sel it a graven image וַיִּסְגָּד־ <S%H5456><s%> vai-yis-god- and falleth down לָֽמוֹ׃ la-mo.

חֶצְיוֹ֙ <S%H2677><s%> chetz-Yo part שָׂרַ֣ף <S%H8313><s%> sa-Raf He burneth בְּמוֹ־ <S%H1119><s%> be-mov- thereof in אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'Esh, the fire עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over חֶצְיוֹ֙ <S%H2677><s%> chetz-Yo with part בָּשָׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> ba-Sar flesh יֹאכֵ֔ל <S%H398><s%> yo-Chel, thereof he eateth יִצְלֶ֥ה <S%H6740><s%> yitz-Leh he roasteth צָלִ֖י <S%H6748><s%> tza-Li roast וְיִשְׂבָּ֑ע <S%H7646><s%> ve-yis-Ba'; and is satisfied אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- also יָחֹם֙ <S%H2552><s%> ya-Chom yea he warmeth וְיֹאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> ve-yo-Mar [himself] and saith הֶאָ֔ח <S%H1889><s%> he-'Ach, Aha חַמּוֹתִ֖י <S%H2552><s%> cham-mo-Ti I am warm רָאִ֥יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti I have seen אֽוּר׃ <S%H217><s%> 'Ur. the fire

וּשְׁאֵ֣רִית֔וֹ <S%H7611><s%> u-she-'E-ri-To, And the residue לְאֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> le-'El a god עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah thereof he maketh לְפִסְל֑וֹ <S%H6459><s%> le-fis-Lo; [even] his graven image; יִסְגֹּוד־ yis-goyd- כיִסְגָּד־ <S%H5456><s%> yis-god- falls ל֤וֹ <S%H5456><s%> lo he falleth down קוְיִשְׁתַּ֙חוּ֙ <S%H7812><s%> ve-yish-Ta-chu unto it and worshippeth וְיִתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <S%H6419><s%> ve-yit-pal-Lel [it] and prayeth אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to וְיֹאמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> ve-yo-Mar unto it and saith הַצִּילֵ֔נִי <S%H5337><s%> hatz-tzi-Le-ni, Deliver כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֵלִ֖י <S%H410><s%> 'e-Li me for thou [art] my god אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah. you

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-de-'U They have not known וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor יָבִ֑ינוּ <S%H995><s%> ya-Vi-nu; nor understood כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for טַ֤ח <S%H2902><s%> tach for he hath shut מֵֽרְאוֹת֙ <S%H7200><s%> me-re-'Ot that they cannot see עֵֽינֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-nei-Hem, their eyes מֵהַשְׂכִּ֖יל <S%H7919><s%> me-has-Kil that they cannot understand לִבֹּתָֽם׃ <S%H3826><s%> lib-bo-Tam. [and] their hearts
